name: band-together
description: A band companion app for musicians

scripts.git:pull: git submodule foreach git pull origin main
scripts.install-all: npm run git:submodules && cd client && bun install && cd ../api && bun install && cd ../db && bun install
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install-all
scripts.db:connect: docker exec -it bandtogether-postgres psql -U postgres -d band_together
